name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】Super Special Party Time! ３Dお披露目！#Kiara3DParty [q3Z9dPHKS3Q]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Kiara plays a burger-serving game and gives an MC transition.
Kiara sitting in a diner booth eating fried chicken.

subtitles.original: Not even cheese in the picture,
subtitles.english: Not even cheese in the picture,

subtitles.original: how am I supposed to remember that?
subtitles.english: how am I supposed to remember that?

subtitles.original: Cheese is ないぞ! 画像!
subtitles.english: There's no cheese! In the picture!

subtitles.original: What? But besides that I was right.
subtitles.english: What? But besides that I was right.

subtitles.original: それ以外は合ってた?
subtitles.english: So besides that, I was correct?

subtitles.original: さすが。
subtitles.english: As expected.

subtitles.original: This is weak!
subtitles.english: This is weak!

subtitles.original: No, that's really weak though.
subtitles.english: No, that's really weak though.

subtitles.original: 嘘でしょ!
subtitles.english: No way!

subtitles.original: Well, I mean... in the end, this is your job.
subtitles.english: Well, I mean... in the end, this is your job.

subtitles.original: This is your job. Not my job.
subtitles.english: This is your job. Not my job.

subtitles.original: I am just here to observe, that's my job. Okay?
subtitles.english: I am just here to observe, that's my job. Okay?

subtitles.original: Well... so, I think it's better
subtitles.english: Well... so, I think it's better

subtitles.english: if I just do mostly idol work

subtitles.original: and dancing and singing, right?
subtitles.english: and dancing and singing, right?

subtitles.original: Mainly...
subtitles.english: Mainly...

subtitles.original: 踊る方向でいきます。
subtitles.english: I'll go in the direction of dancing.

subtitles.original: And you guys do the work, okay?
subtitles.english: And you guys do the work, okay?

subtitles.original: Well then, with that... next song!
